unnormalised: ## Automotive: Traffic Chaos? New Rules Incoming!
normalised: ## Automotive: Traffic Chaos? New Rules Incoming!

unnormalised: Guys, Delhi roads are about to get a whole lotta change! Forget the honking frenzy near AIIMS – the traffic police are cracking down. New regulations are coming into effect next week, just in time for the Onam rush.
normalised: Guys, Delhi roads are about to get a whole lot of change! Forget the honking frenzy near A I I M S – the traffic police are cracking down. New regulations are coming into effect next week, just in time for the Onam rush.

unnormalised: Expect stricter enforcement of lane discipline. Apparently, weaving through traffic like you're trying to grab the last plate of biryani at a wedding just ain't gonna fly anymore.
normalised: Expect stricter enforcement of lane discipline. Apparently, weaving through traffic like you are trying to grab the last plate of biryani at a wedding just is not going to fly anymore.

unnormalised: Fines for jumping signals are reportedly going up to Rs. 5000! Yikes! Also, watch out for increased surveillance near known accident hotspots – they're installing more cameras on the Outer Ring Road and near Gurugram.
normalised: Fines for jumping signals are reportedly going up to rupee five thousand! Yikes! Also, watch out for increased surveillance near known accident hotspots – they are installing more cameras on the Outer Ring Road and near Gurugram.

unnormalised: Sources say they're also considering a point-based system for repeat offenders, kinda like your credit score, but for driving! Accumulate too many points and bam! License suspended.
normalised: Sources say they are also considering a point-based system for repeat offenders, kind of like your credit score, but for driving! Accumulate too many points and bam! License suspended.

unnormalised: Heard whispers they’re even testing out AI-powered cameras that automatically detect helmetless riders. This ain’t Bollywood, folks; wear your helmet!
normalised: Heard whispers they are even testing out A I-powered cameras that automatically detect helmetless riders. This is not Bollywood, folks; wear your helmet!

unnormalised: So, brush up on your traffic rules, drive safe, and maybe lay off the honking, especially near temples and hospitals. Nobody wants a challan spoiling their festival mood! Be road smart, ya’ll!
normalised: So, brush up on your traffic rules, drive safe, and maybe lay off the honking, especially near temples and hospitals. Nobody wants a challan spoiling their festival mood! Be road smart, you all!
